review: Chromecast is a great device for broadcasting content from your computer directly to your TV screen.  It was a breeze to set up and easy to connect.  I did have some connection issues because my router wasn't powerful enough to send a clear signal, but I recently upgraded the router and now have no issues at all.  I do wish that the device would operate on the higher frequency 5ghz, not just the 2.5ghz band.

review: I love Chromecast! I've had it for just over a year now and new updates keep making it even better to be used with various apps on my phone. It's web streaming is pretty awesome now too, though keep in mind everything is dependant on your wi-fi. I use it most with the following apps on my android smart phone: Netflix, HBO GO, Showtime Anytime, Movieplex Play,  Encore Play, Stars Play, and Real Player, which let's me cast downloaded content. Sadly, Amazon Instant Video does not yet have a cast feature, nor does Xfinity on demand or MAX GO. I'm hoping for updates soon.
